mapper.select: SELECT A.a_id, A.s_id, A.sigungu_id, A.a_theme_id, A.a_start_date, A.a_end_date, A.a_addr, A.a_name, A.a_one_liner, A.a_min_people, A.a_max_people, A.a_charge, A.a_thumbnail_img, A.s_site, A.a_reservation_deadline, B.a_post_id, B.a_img_id, B.a_post_content, B.a_view_cnt, B.a_favorite_cnt, B.a_post_date_created, C.a_img1, C.a_img2, C.a_img3, C.a_img4, C.a_img5 FROM activity_info A LEFT OUTER JOIN activity_post B ON A.a_id = B.a_id LEFT OUTER JOIN activity_images C ON B.a_img_id = C.a_img_id WHERE A.a_id = #{aId}
SELECT a_img_id, a_img1, a_img2, a_img3, a_img4, a_img5 FROM activity_images WHERE a_img_id = #{aImgId}
